title: Tell us your problems
subtitle: Can be anything with bothers you. Be it personal, professional, career. The power of Astrology has answers of everything.

title: Tell us about yourself
subtitle: Some more information about your place, date & time of Birth. This will help us map your nakshatra with the position of the stars. The more precise the better

title: Pay a consultation fees
subtitle: If not satisfied, 100% of the amount will be returned. We believe in customer satisfaction. No questions asked.
